text.div:
UK Core Death Notification Status

A CodeSystem to identify the type of death notice as held on Personal Demographics Service (PDS).

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2019 NHS Digital

This code system https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/CodeSystem/UKCore-DeathNotificationStatus-1-0-0 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
1 Informal - death notice received via an update from a local NHS Organisation such as GP or Trust
2 Formal - death notice received from Registrar of Deaths

name: UKCoreDeathNotificationStatus
title: UK Core Death Notification Status
description: A CodeSystem to identify the type of death notice as held on Personal Demographics Service (PDS).

concept.display: Informal - death notice received via an update from a local NHS Organisation such as GP or Trust
Formal - death notice received from Registrar of Deaths
